name: ULTRAFLOW (itch)
description:
Minimalist yet complex puzzle game based on your agility.
No score. No timer. The only challenge is your smoothness.
You only have a limited number of bounces to complete each level.

BEST PLAYED ON MOBILE

Controls :
Click twice to retry
Use ESC to navigate through the menu

Twitter : https://twitter.com/ultraflowGame
Website : http://ultraflow.net
Press : http://ultraflow.net/press

ULTRAFLOW was made by a team of five students during six months.
If you want to support us, don't hesitate to donate.
Read this.

A game made by @le_daku, Franck Fitrzyk, Wiwi, Maxime Bondoux & Theophile Loaec.
